data.enText: done as part of a plan that is meant to achieve a particular purpose or to gain an advantage
data.chText: 根据全局而安排的；战略性的

data.enText: a strategic decision to sell off part of the business
data.chText: 卖掉企业一部分的战略决策

data.enText: Cameras were set up at strategic points (= in places where they would be most effective) along the route.
data.chText: 在沿途一些最佳位置架设了摄像机。

data.enText: connected with getting an advantage in a war or other military situation
Malta was of vital strategic importance during the war.
data.chText: 在那次战争中，马耳他的战略意义至为关键。

data.enText: intended to be fired at an enemy's country rather than used in a battle

data.chText: 安放在最佳位置的麦克风
有重大战略意义的目标

tr: highly important to or an integral part of a strategy or plan of action especially in war
relating to or concerned with strategy
example: the islands are of strategic importance

example.ex: ...the new strategic thinking which NATO leaders produced at the recent London summit...
example.tran: 北约领导人在最近召开的伦敦首脑会议上提出的新的战略思想

example.ex: ...a strategic plan for reducing the rate of infant mortality...
example.tran: 降低婴儿死亡率的战略计划

example.ex: The island is of strategic importance to France.
example.tran: 该岛对法国来说具有重要的战略意义。

value.def: Strategic means relating to the most important, general aspects of something such as a military operation or political policy, especially when these are decided in advance.

example.tran: 具有重要战略意义的道路、桥梁和建筑物

example.ex: ...integrating politics, economics and military affairs, thinking strategically, setting priorities and making choices.
example.tran: 将政治学、经济学和军事结合在一起，从战略的角度思考问题，确定主次关系，并作出选择

value.def: Strategic weapons are very powerful missiles that can be fired only after a decision to use them has been made by a political leader.

example.ex: ...the marble benches Eve had placed at strategic points throughout the gardens, where the views were spectacular.
example.tran: 伊芙在各花园景色迷人的地方巧妙安置的大理石长凳

value.def: If you put something in a strategic position, you place it cleverly in a position where it will be most useful or have the most effect.
value.tran: (位置)具有战略意义的，重要的，合适的

example.ex: We had kept its presence hidden with a strategically placed chair.
example.tran: 我们用一张摆放得很巧妙的椅子将它隐藏了起来。
